headline.print_headline: Ex-Wife: Police Officer Joined KKK Undercover
headline.main: Ex-Wife: Police Officer Joined KKK Undercover

lead_paragraph: The ex-wife of a police officer who left the department after a report tied him to the Ku Klux Klan told investigators that the couple joined the group as part of an undercover operation, according to a report released Tuesday by the Florida Department of Law Enforcement.
